meanings.definition: A unit of magnetic intensity equal to one gauss at the center of a loop of wire one centimeter in radius through which passes a current of one ampere.
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the magnetic field in oersteds using a special device.
meanings.sent2: The magnet's strength was calculated in oersteds to determine its power.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to play with the oersteds measurement tool, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like the magnetic force in oersteds, pulling her closer with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The concept of oersteds can be visualized as the invisible hands of magnetism reaching out.
